pal 0.0.9082
  • Reference

Get roxygen2 block object

Source: R/pal.gen.R
roxy_obj.Rd

Extracts a single object from a list of roxy_block objects.

roxy_obj(blocks, obj_name)

Arguments

blocks

A list of roxy_block objects as returned by roxy_blocks().
obj_name

Object name to extract, usually a function name. A character scalar.

Value

A roxy_block object.

See also

Other package documentation functions: roxy_blocks(), roxy_tag_value()
